short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get notified when a product's price or availibiity changes.  Add your own webhook URL to ping when a product changes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Product Watch gives you an easy way to keep track of the price and availability of products you're interested in.  Once a product is added to the watch list it will be periodically checked automatically.  If the price of availability changes you will receive a notification.

• Quickly add a product to your watch list by clicking the extension icon and then the "Watch this product" button.  When ProductWatch detects a product on the current tab it will display a "+" symbol, letting you know it can be watched.

• When a product's price or availability changes, ProductWatch will notify you via a system notification.

• Easily browse, search, and reorder your watch list.

• COLLECTS NO PERSONAL INFORMATION.  This extension runs purely in your browser and does not require you to surrender any personal information to use.

✅ Please note that browser notifications must be enabled for you to receive them.
long.de,es,fr:
ProductWatch gives you an easy way to keep track of the price and availability of products you're interested in.  Once a product is added to the watch list it will be periodically checked automatically.  If the price of availability changes you will receive a notification.

If ProductWatch detects a product on your current tab, the extension icon will display a "+" symbol letting you know that you can watch this product.  Once watched the icon will illuminate green so you know the product is now being watched.
long.nl:
ProductWatch gives you an easy way to keep track of the price and availability of products you're interested in.  Once a product is added to the watch list it will be periodically checked automatically.  If the price of availability changes you will receive a notification.

• Quickly add a product to your watch list by clicking the extension icon and then the "Watch this product" button.  When ProductWatch detects a product on the current tab it will display a "+" symbol, letting you know it can be watched.

• When a product's price or availability changes, ProductWatch will notify you via a system notification.

• Define an outgoing webhook URL that ProductWatch will send product information to via a POST request when the price or availability changes.

• Easily browse, search, and reorder your watch list.

• Adjust the frequency at which ProductWatch automatically refreshes the products on your watch list as you wish.

• COLLECTS NO PERSONAL INFORMATION.  This extension runs purely in your browser and does not require you to surrender any personal information to use.

✅ Please note that browser notifications must be enabled for you to receive them.
